title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.10 - Emergency projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.10 - Emergency projects

State Regulations

An emergency project which is immediately necessary for the
protection of life or property shall not be subject to review. Any person
undertaking a project which is believed to be an emergency project shall inform
the commission by certified mail or telegram within 48 hours after the project
is commenced. If the commission determines that such project is not immediately
necessary for the protection of life or property and that it is subject to
review, it shall so inform such person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9500.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
